Please visit our Flagship Store at 
Marina Bay Sands
10 Bayfront Ave, Singapore 018956
Unit 88-88
Alex - Sommbot - is powered by IBM's Watson AI, a solution that is transforming the retail experience both in-store and online.

Good Day, How can i help you today? What would you like to know?
- Store Hours
- Our Location
- Our Menu
- Ask me anything about wine
- Tell me a wine joke

Hello. How may I help you? Here are some of the things you can ask:
- Our Location
- Our Menu
- Ask me anything about wine
- Tell me a wine joke
We only accept payment by Paynow or credit card.

Alex - SommBot - is the first local sommelier chatbot. It is backed The Wine Sommeliers, a boutique wine company founded by four wine enthusiasts with digital AI skills. Alex taps on the power of AI and deep learning to suggest personalised wine recommendations, make wine discovery and purchase fun, accessible and effortless for wine drinks of every level.
We have a range of wines available. You can choose by red or white or by taste. Which do you prefer?

At The Wine Sommelier, This is our list of White Wine.

Our wines are delicious, layered with an exquisite finish. Choose your preferred note below

The Wine Sommelier currently delivers to Singapore addresses only and we deliver on a Next Day Delivery basis.
 Alcoholic purchase above $100 will get free delivery!
 A $10 delivery fee will be incurred for orders below $100.
 We deliver to anywhere in Singapore, even to your picnic in the beach, botanic gardens or even to a chalet party! We suggest receiving your item in advance as actual day delivery time depends heavily on traffic and weather conditions.
 Delivery to Sentosa will incur an additional $10 delivery charge.
 In a case of a failed delivery, or failed payment, a charge of not less that $15 will be incurred in compensation for any administrative costs and mileage.
 A surcharge of $7 is applicable for deliveries to your designated BBQ Pits in any of our National Parks.
Examples:
> East Coast Park
> West Coast Park
> Pasir Ris Park
> Labrador Park
> Sembawang Park
